# Cell (Room)
## Overview
**Cell**

**Create** 5 Goods, 4 Labor (180 gp); **Time** 16 days 

**Size** 1â€“9 squares 

This uncomfortable room can imprison 1 to 4 captives. It is typically nothing more than a stone room with a straw-lined floor, though some might have the barest of comforts, like cots or chamber pots. One wall is typically constructed of sturdy bars and a door affixed with a simple lock. You can install manacles
